mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE (SEQ_RECEIVE, SEQ_SEND, MESSAGE, INSERTDATE) VALUES ((SELECT USERSEQ FROM USERDATA WHERE NICKNAME = #{param1}), #{param2}, #{param3}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT M.*, R.NICKNAME AS NICK_RECEIVE, S.NICKNAME AS NICK_SEND FROM MESSAGE M, USERDATA R, USERDATA S WHERE R.USERSEQ = M.SEQ_RECEIVE AND S.USERSEQ = M.SEQ_SEND AND (SEQ_RECEIVE = #{param1} OR SEQ_SEND = #{param1}) AND M.MESSAGE LIKE '%#{param2}%' AND R.NICKNAME LIKE '%#{param3}%' AND S.NICKNAME LIKE '%#{param4}%'
